/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a hazy blue sky. The trees, with their bare branches, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is devoid of any traffic, adding to the tranquility of the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
